DOC.brief_title: Twenty-five-year Experience With Medtronic-Hall Valve Prosthesis
DOC.detailed_description: The Medtronic-Hall ( MH ) tilt valve disk first implant Oslo June 1977 . From 1977 1987 , valve use valve choice insert total 1,104 consecutive patient department . The MH valve make single piece titanium weld . The disk make tungsten impregnated graphite carbon pyrolytic coating . The tungsten render disk radiopaque . In aortic position maximal open 75Ëš . A central aperture disk allow free rotation . The valve rotatable sew ring . The sew ring make Teflon . Aortic sizes 20-31 mm ( out diameter ) . The initial clinical result publish 1979 ( 1 ) . The cohort patient followed-up analysed 5 , 10 15 year ( 2-5 ) . In present study report 25-year follow-up data 816 patient undergoing aortic valve replacement ( AVR ) special reference survival , functional status , valve-related complication impact concomitant surgery .
